DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to compare how efficient two different types of PDTs are when used in combination with topical 5-ALA. The two types of PDT lights are Blu-U light and Candela V-beam Pulse Dye Laser.
DOC.brief_title: Topical 5-ALA-PDT With Blu-U Therapy Versus Topical 5-ALA With Pulse Dye Laser In Treating Recalcitrant Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: 1879 years of age Patients who failed the topical and oral antibiotics after 6 month therapy. Patients who failed the topical retinoids after 6 month therapy. Patients that are not good candidate to start oral isotretinoin (Accutane) due to contraindications. Patients who have had Isotretinoin therapy less that 1 year prior to this ALAPDT procedure. Patients who have an adverse reaction to light exposure (for example photo exacerbated seizures). Patients with a history of porphyria.
